experiences.title: Full-stack Developer
experiences.description: As the principal full-stack developer at Kooest, a custom digital solutions agency, I recently designed a high-performing, secure website for a UAE-based construction agency using TypeScript and Next.js, leveraged Vercel for global reach, integrated unique open-source packages for a bespoke user experience, and am committed to consistently delivering a perfect blend of aesthetics and functionality while incorporating advanced technologies for scalable, future-ready solutions.

experiences.title: Back End Developer
experiences.description: Successfully developed two government websites, served thousands of users, deployed projects via AWS and Digital Ocean with 99.9% uptime, and enhanced team productivity by 20% using best software development practices. As a team leader. Coordinated with engineers, programmers, and designers to deliver high-standard projects on time, reaching a customer satisfaction rate of 95%.

experiences.title: Junior Software Engineer
experiences.description: As part of a multidisciplinary team, I designed and developed a contemporary, user-friendly website for a car services company, leveraging VueJS, TailwindCSS, and JavaScript. Our collaborative efforts, following industry best practices, led to a 20% surge in website traffic, a 15% boost in customer conversions, and ensured on-time, high-quality project completion.

experiences.title: Software Quality Assurance Intern
experiences.description: Streamlined a user interface review process scrutinizing over 50 designs for functionality and guidelines adherence, tested various web and standalone apps including custom client-server solutions, crafted frontend web applications' interfaces now employed company-wide enhancing user experience and functionality.
